body: Picnicking          Picnic Areas       Bear Brook: 35 tables, 30 fireplaces Fabbri: 23 tables and fireplaces Frazer Point (Schoodic): 26 tables, 22 fireplaces Pretty Marsh: 11 tables, 8 fireplaces Seawall: 14 tables, 12 fireplaces Thompson Island: 46 tables, 44 fireplaces
title: Acadia National Park: Picnicking
